survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Station User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to improve service quality, accessibility, and overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you most frequently use?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear definitions or tooltips for each charging level if respondents might be unfamiliar.

script.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you most frequently use?

questions.question_text: Which factors are most important to you when choosing an EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of up to 3 options. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with a maximum selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: Which factors are most important to you when choosing an EV charging station? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the reliability of the EV charging stations you use? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistency. Include a 'Not Applicable' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the reliability of the EV charging stations you use? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Please describe)
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to capture detailed feedback. Consider limiting response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT) with a character limit of 500.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Please describe)
